summary: This bill, the "Department of Veterans Affairs Creation of On-Site Treatment Systems Affording Veterans Improvements and Numerous General Safety Enhancements Act" or "VA COST SAVINGS Enhancements Act," directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to identify VA facilities that would save money using on-site medical waste treatment systems. The Secretary must create a cost analysis model to compare off-site versus on-site treatment costs. The bill mandates the installation and operation of on-site systems at identified facilities and defines regulated medical waste. The bill stipulates that no additional funds are authorized.
